headline: Roth Capital Downgrades Expand Energy Corporation (EXE) to Neutral, Price Target Lowered to $98
summary: Expand Energy Corporation (NASDAQ:EXE) is among the 13 Best S&P 500 Stocks to Buy According to Wall Street Analysts, based on upside potential. However, on August 18, Roth Capital downgraded the stock to Neutral from Buy and slashed its price target to $98 from $125. The adjustment by the firm was part of a wider […]
